Shoppers request items sold at online retailers like Amazon and eBay, and travelers bid to deliver them on their next trip, often earning 15-20% of the item’s total price in rewards. Filter orders based on your destination and bid on whichever items you want. Meet with your shopper in-person, deliver their item and get paid. Customer Loyalty Program.
Simple. Quick. Cheap.

HOW IT WORKS IN 3 STEPS:

1- The business owner downloads the "WinStamp Business" app.
2- The customer downloads the "WinStamp" app and has a unique QR code.
3- The business owner stamps the customer by scanning his QR code.

BASIC FEATURES:
• Customizable Stamp Card: You can adjust card color, icon image and icon color.
• Detailed Customer List: You can see the information of your customers.
• Messaging to Customers: You can send bulk messages to your customers.
• Live Statistics: You can track daily, weekly and monthly stamping numbers.

FEATURES WE ARE PROUD OF:

• Quick Start: You can start your customer loyalty program in a few minutes without contacting us and waiting for any approval process.

• Customer Friendly: No information is required from customers on the customer app. So, there is no registration process for them.

• Safe Method: The customer app does not get stamp by scanning a qr code. But, the business app scans the customer's qr code and stamps it.

• No Extra Devices: The entire system runs on the owner's, employee's and customers' own cell phones. No extra tablet or bluetooth device required.

• 30 Days Free Trial: You can use our system free of charge for 30 days without subscribing and without providing credit card information. If you are not satisfied, you can leave without giving a cent.

• Reasonable Pricing: Our monthly subscription plans are based on the number of branches of your business. There is no limit such as customer limit or stamp limit.

Do not hesitate to contact us to ask any question. We improve our application according to your requests.
